The vast majority of Argentine Jews are descended from immigrants who arrived from Europe. These ashkenazic Jews migrated from small towns or shtetels of Poland, Lithuania, Russia, Germany, Romania or Ukraine, leaving behind most of their Jewish relatives.

[ 2 syll. sie-ber(t) , si-ebe-rt ] The baby boy name Siebert is pronounced as S IY BerT †. The origin of Siebert is the English language. Siebert is a derivative of the name Seabert. Siebert is not commonly used as a baby boy name. It is not in the top 1000 names. Seibert is of English origin. The meaning of the name is 'bright sea'. Seibert is a form of the name Seabert. A form of Seibert is the name Sebert. Seibert is unusual as a baby boy name. It is not ranked within the top 1000.
